ultimate.name: Awesomeness
ultimate.description: Lift slides to a tile within _moveEffectRange tiles and heals all adjacent allies for _healing health. She does this 3 times.

abilities.name: Walk
abilities.description: Move up to _moveSpeed tiles. Cannot pass through enemies or obstacles.

abilities.name: Food Heist
abilities.description: Steal food from an adjacent character. Target loses _loseTurnMeter Turn Meter. Lift gains 5 Pancakes

abilities.name: Eat Pancakes
abilities.description: Lift eats as many Pancakes as she can to recover Lifelight.

abilities.name: Slickness
abilities.description: Slide to a tile up to _moveEffectRange tiles away, ignoring all obstacles.

abilities.name: Regrowth
abilities.description: Heal an adjacent ally for _healing health
